Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a27877ae9a92d899fdf47e709095866c52d98ac_CrowdsaleMortgage.sol#180-183) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a27877ae9a92d899fdf47e709095866c52d98ac_CrowdsaleMortgage.sol#182)

CrowdsaleMortgage.fallback() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a27877ae9a92d899fdf47e709095866c52d98ac_CrowdsaleMortgage.sol#257-261) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now > start && now < start + period * 24 * 60 * 60) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a27877ae9a92d899fdf47e709095866c52d98ac_CrowdsaleMortgage.sol#258)
